text: Why should exec() and eval() be avoided?
I've seen this multiple times in multiple places, but never have found a satisfying explanation as to why this should be the case.
So, hopefully, one will be presented here.
Why should we (at least, generally) not use exec() and eval()?
EDIT: I see that people are assuming that this question pertains to web servers – it doesn't.
I can see why an unsanitized string being passed to exec could be bad.
